subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Barret Jackman scored his first goal in 36 games with 1 minute 3 seconds left, launching a shot from center ice to give host St. Louis a 5-4 win.
snippet: Barret Jackman scored his first goal in 36 games with 1 minute 3 seconds left, launching a shot from center ice to give host St. Louis a 5-4 win.
